abilities.Adaptability: This Ability increases the power of moves that are the same type as the Pokemon.
abilities.Blaze: When the Pokemon's HP is low, the power of Fire-type moves goes up.
abilities.CloudNine: This Ability causes the floor to have Ineffective Weather, removing the effects of weather.
abilities.CuteCharm: When the Pokemon is hit with a contact move, like Tackle or Scratch, the attacker sometimes gets Infatuated.
abilities.Guts: When the Pokemon is affected by a bad status condition, like poison or a burn, the power of its physical moves goes up..
abilities.LightningRod: The Electric-type moves of enemies in the same room are drawn to the Pokemon and absorbed. When the Pokemon absorbs Electric-type moves, its Sp. Atk goes up.
abilities.Overgrow: When the Pokemon's HP is low, the power of Grass-type moves goes up.
abilities.PickUp: When the Pokemon goes to a different floor, it may pick up an item. However, there will be places where there is nothing for the pokemon to pick up.
abilities.Static: When the Pokemon is hit with a contact move, like Tackle or Scratch, the attacker is sometimes afflicted with Paralysis.
abilities.Torrent: When the Pokemon's HP is low, the power of Water-type moves goes up.
